Sentence.string: Good morning Walter, I hope you are in good health. I’m not going to bother you too long, but I’m trying to solve a case. Have you by any chance heard something about the actor Marcus Blayton who died yesterday?
Good morning Percy, I would be glad to answer your questions, but usually you are more convincing. Did you forget my habits?
Newspaper and doughnuts, sure. I always forget, but it’s for your own good. If you really matter, I’ll bring them to you. Stay here.
